(2,): As a system administrator, I want to log submission status changes, so that I can track the processing of FABS submissions As a data processor, I want to update FABS submission statuses, so that submissions progress through the correct workflow stages As a compliance officer, I want to check GTAS window status, so that I know when the system is locked down for reporting periods
